Name: Unreal Drone Racing
About the game: Unreal Drone Racing is an arcade style racing game with drones... and lasers! Can be played with mouse and keyboard or joypads, for one player. Also Featured: - 9 Levels on 3 speed categories: 50 HP (normal), 100 HP (fast) or 150 HP (unreal) - 6 different upgrades for your Drone: Armor, Engines, Batteries, Laser Cannon, Nitro and Smoke Bombs! - Toggle between Realistic First Person View and Arcade-style Third Person camera - Easy and adaptive game controllers - Full original old school music - Revive the feeling of classics like Mario Kart, F-Zero and Rock'n Roll Racing, with 3d graphics and modern game design.
